data.name: Evo_Ask
data.value: Do you seek new evolution?

data.name: Evo_Ask_Who
data.value: Which Pokémon seeks new evolution?

data.name: Evo_Begin
data.value: Ye who seek awakening,[pause=0] let us begin.

data.name: Evo_Choice
data.value: What will {0} evolve into?

data.name: Evo_Complete
data.value: {0} evolved into {1}!

data.name: Evo_Confirm
data.value: {0} shall evolve into {1}. Is that OK?

data.name: Evo_Confirm_Item
data.value: {0} shall give a {1}, and evolve into {2}.[pause=20] Is that OK?

data.name: Evo_End
data.value: Ye shall return if evolution is what ye seek...

data.name: Evo_Info_001
data.value: There are those among Pokémon that can evolve.

data.name: Evo_Info_002
data.value: Such Pokémon can evolve at this very spot if they satisfy certain conditions.

data.name: Evo_Info_003
data.value: Evolution brings about changes in appearance and abilities.

data.name: Evo_Info_004
data.value: Not only that, some Pokémon even change type and learn different moves.

data.name: Evo_Info_005
data.value: However...[pause=0] the requirements for evolution differ among Pokémon.

data.name: Evo_Info_006
data.value: You must also be aware of this:

data.name: Evo_Info_007
data.value: Once it has evolved, a Pokémon can never regain its previous form.

data.name: Evo_Intro_1
data.value: ...[pause=0]A voice emanates from somewhere.

data.name: Evo_Intro_2
data.value: Ye who seek awakening...[pause=0] This is Luminous Spring.

data.name: Evo_None
data.value: ...[pause=0]{0} cannot evolve any further.

data.name: Evo_None_Now
data.value: ...[pause=0]{0} cannot evolve right now.

data.name: Evo_Option_Evolve
data.value: Evolve
